title: Partial Highlight
sub: For breaking up the part line or adding a money piece.

title: Half Head Highlight
sub: Highlights around the perimeter and top of the head to add dimension and brightness. Recommended between full highlights.

title: Full Highlight
sub: Highlights throughout the entire head. Recommended if youâ€™re looking for more impact.

title: Base Bump
sub: An add on to your usual highlight retouch. Includes a base color applied to the roots to slightly lighten your natural base colour.

title: Single Process
sub: A great option for covering grays. Applied to the regrowth and finished with a gloss on the ends.

title: Double Process
sub: Bleach & tone. For clients who want to go platinum, touch up platinum roots, or finish with a fantasy color. Consultation required.

title: Tint Back
sub: Needed when the desired level is 3+ levels darker, or when pre-lightened hair requires a filler to avoid blue/green/violet muddy tones.

title: Gloss
sub: Included with all color services. A demi permanent treatment to enhance and refresh color, and add shine. Can be clear or tinted, counteract warmth, or add richness.

title: Color Correction
sub: Varies from client to client and is intended to correct unwanted color. Consultation required.

title: Transformative Color
sub: Intended to achieve a more drastic color change. Consultation required.

title: Fantasy Color
sub: An add on service for pre lightened hair. We can create a variety of hues using semi-permanent neons, pastels, and silvers. Consultation required.
